sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: The two zoom eyepieces are given as an example of design.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了两个变倍目镜设计实例。

sentences.english: A welder wears goggles to protect his eyes from being burned.
sentences.chinese: 电焊工戴着护目镜防止眼睛被灼伤。

sentences.english: The Huygens ocular, which dates back over 250 years is still in wide use today.
sentences.chinese: 二百五十多年前的惠更斯目镜今天还在广泛使用。

sentences.english: BUG, Easi-Scan remote display, wrist monitor.
sentences.chinese: 远程显示器，通用护目镜。

sentences.english: I used a pair of tinted safety goggles as part of the faceplate .
sentences.chinese: 我用了一双染过色的护目镜作为面板的一部分。

sentences.english: Do not watch welding processes unless your eyes are properly protected.
sentences.chinese: 没有正确的护目镜，不要看烧焊作业。

sentences.english: Try to use a higher-power eyepiece.
sentences.chinese: 尝试使用一个高倍目镜。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enthusiasts wearing goggles catch a glimpse of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 数百位热情人士戴著护目镜捕捉日食现象的惊鸿一瞥。

sentences.english: Grease on the hands can easily get on goggles.
sentences.chinese: 手上的油脂膏容易沾到护目镜上。

sentences.english: Last, put a glare screen3 on your monitor to reduce squinting.
sentences.chinese: 最后，在屏幕上加片护目镜来减少眯眼。

sentences.english: This is the size of the field our eye sees when looking into the eyepiece.
sentences.chinese: 就是我们透过目镜可以看到的区域范围。

sentences.english: Wear appropriatc protective clothing compatible chemical-resistant gloves and chemical safety goggles.
sentences.chinese: 穿戴防护服，防护手套和化学安全护目镜。

sentences.english: Then the scratches and spots on the field lens would be visible at the eye lens.
sentences.chinese: 此时场镜上的划痕和小点会在接目镜中看见。

sentences.english: The ocular micrometer is a circular diameter graticule.
sentences.chinese: 目镜测微计是一个圆形十字格。
